name: project 2024
description:
you find a deserted planet;,your job is to plant plants to gain seeds and get upgrades 

controles

q; plants flower plant for 3 seeds

E; plants lava plant for 100 seeds 

R; plants water plant for 500 seeds

right click a plant to upgrade it ;

starting upgrade prices;

flower;  25 seeds

lava; 500 seeds

water; 20000 seeds 

(price multiplyes by 2 every upgrade)
